title: Canan
author: Canan
content: Selling BUFF 163 Balance for Crypto (USDT). The rate depends on the daily market rate from USD to RMB.Transactions under $1000: 4-5%Transactions above $1000: 1-2%For larger amounts we can make the rate even better! We will directly deposit into your BUFF account using the QR code provided by you. Contact me on Telegram: https://t.me/RealparadeshopAlways confirm with Forum PM before transacting!
